statements: SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crops WHERE growth_stage = 'Vegetative';
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, growth_stage FROM crops WHERE planting_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name FROM crops WHERE growth_stage='Seedling' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE growth_stage='Vegetative' ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, planting_date FROM crops WHERE growth_stage='Flowering' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE growth_stage='Harvest' OFFSET 3;
SELECT MAX(planting_date) AS latest_date FROM crops WHERE growth_stage='Mature';
SELECT * FROM crop_types;
SELECT crop_name, crop_description FROM crop_types WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM growth_stages ORDER BY duration_days DESC;
SELECT stage_name, stage_description FROM growth_stages WHERE duration_days > 10;
SELECT crop_name, stage_name, duration_days FROM crop_types JOIN growth_stages ON crop_id = stage_id;
SELECT * FROM crop_types
SELECT crop_id, crop_name FROM crop_types ORDER BY crop_name DESC
SELECT crop_name, crop_description FROM crop_types WHERE crop_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT stage_name, stage_description, duration_days FROM growth_stages WHERE duration_days > 10 ORDER BY duration_days ASC
SELECT * FROM crop_types JOIN growth_stages ON crop_types.crop_id = growth_stages.stage_id
SELECT * FROM crop_types;
SELECT crop_name, crop_description FROM crop_types WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM planting_dates ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT stage_name, stage_description FROM growth_stages WHERE crop_id = 2;
SELECT crop_name, stage_name FROM crop_types JOIN growth_stages ON crop_types.crop_id = growth_stages.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM crop_types ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_description FROM crop_types WHERE crop_id=1;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_types JOIN planting_dates ON crop_types.crop_id = planting_dates.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM growth_stages WHERE stage_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY stage_name;
SELECT crop_name, stage_name FROM crop_types JOIN growth_stages ON crop_types.crop_id = growth_stages.crop_id WHERE crop_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM crop_types;
SELECT crop_name, crop_description FROM crop_types;
SELECT planting_date, crop_name FROM planting_dates INNER JOIN crop_types ON planting_dates.crop_id = crop_types.crop_id;
SELECT stage_name, days_to_complete FROM growth_stages WHERE crop_id = 1;

SELECT crop_name, planting_date, stage_name FROM planting_dates INNER JOIN crop_types ON planting_dates.crop_id = crop_types.crop_id INNER JOIN growth_stages ON planting_dates.crop_id = growth_stages.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM crop_types;
SELECT crop_name, crop_description FROM crop_types WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT stage_name, days_to_complete FROM growth_stages WHERE crop_id = 2 ORDER BY days_to_complete DESC;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_planning WHERE planning_id > 5 AND irrigation_notes LIKE '%water%' ORDER BY crop_id, stage_id;
SELECT DISTINCT planting_date FROM planting_dates WHERE crop_id = 3 AND planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CropTypes;
SELECT crop_name, crop_description FROM CropTypes WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT planting_date, planting_location FROM PlantingDates ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT stage_name, growth_description FROM GrowthStages WHERE stage_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM CropPlanting WHERE date_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CropTypes
SELECT crop_name, crop_description FROM CropTypes WHERE crop_id = 3
SELECT planting_date, planting_location FROM PlantingDates ORDER BY planting_date DESC
SELECT * FROM GrowthStages WHERE stage_name LIKE '%flower%'
SELECT cp.crop_id, cp.stage_id, pd.planting_date FROM CropPlanting cp INNER JOIN PlantingDates pd ON cp.date_id = pd.date_id
